com.here.android.mpa.ar

Interface ARController.OnPreDrawMapListener

  • Enclosing class:
    ARController

    public static interface ARController.OnPreDrawMapListener
    Listener for the map pre draw event. This event is triggered just before the map is being drawn. This listener is useful in case client wants to update things on the map and synchronize the update action with the draw cycle.

    Called on the Render thread.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPreDrawMap(float orientationDeg, float tiltDeg, GeoCoordinate center)
      Map pre draw callback

    • Method Detail

      • onPreDrawMap

        void onPreDrawMap(float orientationDeg,
                float tiltDeg,
                GeoCoordinate center)
        Map pre draw callback

        Called on the Render thread.

        Parameters:
        orientationDeg - Current Map orientation in degrees
        tiltDeg - Current Map tilt in degrees
        center - Current Map center
